name: GetProjectEnvironmentVariables
description:
Retrieve environment variables for a specified project.

Use this tool to get the environment variables associated with a project by providing its `id` or `name`. Useful for managing and configuring project settings.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the project to retrieve environment variables for.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: filter_by_git_branch
parameters.description: Specify the git branch to filter the environment variable results. Must have target set to 'preview'.

value_schema.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable to filter the results (must have target=preview)

parameters.name: decrypt_values
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to decrypt environment variable values. Use 'false' to keep them encrypted.

value_schema.description: If true, the environment variable value will be decrypted

parameters.name: caller_source
parameters.description: Specify the source making the API call.

value_schema.description: The source that is calling the endpoint.

parameters.name: custom_environment_id
parameters.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project. Use this to specify a specific custom environment.

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: custom_environment_slug
parameters.description: The custom environment slug (name) within the project to filter specific settings.

value_schema.description: The custom environment slug (name) within the project

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. Use this to specify the team context for the request.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: gitBranch
parameters.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable to filter the results (must have target=preview)

value_schema.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable to filter the results (must have target=preview)

parameters.name: decrypt
parameters.description: If true, the environment variable value will be decrypted

value_schema.description: If true, the environment variable value will be decrypted

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source that is calling the endpoint.

value_schema.description: The source that is calling the endpoint.

parameters.name: customEnvironmentId
parameters.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: customEnvironmentSlug
parameters.description: The custom environment slug (name) within the project

value_schema.description: The custom environment slug (name) within the project

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name
